document_data.name: The Undying
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Undying''' referred to the trio of [[rom|undead giants]] who were the true rulers of the necropolis of [[Sokkar]] as of [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}

Their names were [[Noq|Noq the Inspired]], [[Arun (Zakhara)|Arun the Ever-Vigilant]], and [[Merodach|Merodach the Deprived]].
document_data.Activities: The rom left Sokkar to itself unless a pressing matter arose. When the city was still inhabited the Undying entertained the [[human]] rulers who made yearly pilgrimages seeking the wisdom of the undead.
